attributes.action: New Parliamentary MP Backed Petition Against A.T.O.S. and D.W.P. for Unfairness and Unprofessionalism
attributes.additional_details:
I.   The current Welfare Benefit Reforms are continuing to be unfairly implemented, particularly in relation to those with less visible health problems, such as mental illness.

-

II.    A.T.O.S. and the D.W.P. are declaring numerous Sickness and Disability Benefit Claimants "Fit for Work", when they are - in fact - documented as being very clearly "Unfit for Work".

-

III.   Numerous sick, mentally ill and disabled Citizens are now suffering ever more than ever, due to not having enough money for even basic things such as food and heating expenses.

-

The Bottom Line:

-

TO THE GOVERNMENT:

-

SORT OUT THE UNFAIRNESS AND UNPROFESSIONALISM OF A.T.O.S. HEALTH CARE AND THE DEPARTMENT OF WORK AND PENSIONS.

[short version of MP and Local Councillor Backed Parliamentary Petition - the full version is available online.]
